title: Question for Wukong Pros
body:
Can you actually mitigate or completely negate {{champion:30}}'s Ultimate with {{champion:62}}'s W (Decoy)? 
I've never seen a Wukong do it. I haven't however surfed Youtube for it.

EDIT: For Those that don't know, you can time the ability that right before Karthus' Ult hits you, you can decoy and the Clone/Decoy takes most or all of the damage.

replies.body: no, Karthus ult does not require vision to do damage
Sorry I should have elaborated. You can dodge the ultimate so that right before it deals damage you decoy and the Clone will take most or all of the damage.

> [{quoted}](name=kJs,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=LZk6lnPp,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-20T02:05:46.055+0000)
>
> Sorry I should have elaborated. You can dodge the ultimate so that right before it deals damage you decoy and the Clone will take most or all of the damage.

nope, that only works with shaco clone because it deliberately makes you invulnerable while he splits
quick google search brings up a 2012 vid showing it doesnt work.
You can't avoid karthus' ult but you can avoid caitlyn's by having your clone block the shot for you.
No but flashing as Karthus' ult hits avoids the damage.
